summary: Every day in August I painted something DnD related (Dungeons and Drawgust). This Nott-and-scrollcase is one of my favorites I...
caption:
Every day in August I painted something DnD related (Dungeons and Drawgust). This Nott-and-scrollcase is one of my favorites I painted over the whole month. There’s something about her face that’s so lively and stylized and I love how bright the green watercolor turned out :) It’s also one of the few watercolor paintings I’ve done where I paint first, ink after the paint is done - a technique I should play with more I think!

The full set of daily drawings is posted to my twitter and my instagram (see bio for links).

summary: Art that I did during Pub Draw last night. ( I drew my dnd back up instead of Keyleth) Feel free to absolutely ROAST this...
caption:
Art that I did during Pub Draw last night. ( I drew my dnd back up instead of Keyleth)

Feel free to absolutely ROAST this drawing. While I am happy with it, I would like pointers on how to improve. I noticed my initial sketch seemed to have more… life? to it then the colored version. I’m still learning and would like some input on how to better improve line work and shading.

summary: I’m starting TAZ while waiting for the new CR episode and it. is. hilarious!
title: I’m starting TAZ while waiting for the new CR episode and it. is. hilarious!

summary: With all the most genius love and respect in the world for Marisha Ray, I seriously cannot bring myself to like Keyleth. Maybe...
body:
With all the most genius love and respect in the world for Marisha Ray, I seriously cannot bring myself to like Keyleth. Maybe its because I started with season 2 but that character rubs me such the wrong way. She believes herself to be the “voice of reason” while just coming off as an unnecessarily pessimistic, self righteous pain in the ass.

There are moments where I enjoy her character, but it isn’t long before her less desirable traits rear their ugly head and I’m left rolling my eyes. A lot.

Absolutely no shade to people who enjoy and love this character. Just very much not for me.

reblog.comment:
